    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddBooking
     
    AddBookingWindow
    GUI window that allows users to add a new booking to the flight booking system.
    AddCustomer
     
    AddCustomerWindow
    GUI window for adding a new customer to the flight booking system.
    AddFlight
    Command to add a new flight to the flight booking system.
    AddFlightWindow
    A GUI window to add a new flight to the FlightBookingSystem.
    Booking
    Represents a booking in the flight booking system.
    Booking.SeatClass
    Seat class options.
    Booking.Status
    Status of a booking.
    BookingDataManager
    Manages the loading and storing of booking data from and to a text file.
    BookingTest
    Unit test class for the Booking class.
    CancelBookingInMemory
    Command to cancel a booking and store the cancelled booking in memory.
    CancelBookings
    Command to cancel and remove a booking for a specific customer and flight.
    CancelBookingWindow
    GUI window for cancelling an existing booking in the Flight Booking System.
    Command
    Represents a command that can be executed within the flight booking system.
    CommandParser
    Parses command lines entered by the user and creates corresponding Command objects to perform operations on the FlightBookingSystem.
    Customer
    Represents a customer in the flight booking system.
    CustomerDataManager
    Handles loading and storing customer data to and from a file.
    CustomerTest
    Unit test class for the Customer class.
    DataManager
    Interface representing a data manager responsible for loading and storing parts of the flight booking system data.
    EditBookings
    Command to edit an existing booking by its booking ID.
    EditBookingWindow
    GUI window for editing an existing booking in the Flight Booking System.
    Flight
     
    FlightBookingSystem
    Core class representing the flight booking system.
    FlightBookingSystemData
    Utility class that manages the loading and storing of all flight booking system data.
    FlightBookingSystemException
    FlightBookingSystemException extends Exception class and is a custom exception that is used to notify the user about errors or invalid commands.
    FlightBookingSystemTest
     
    FlightDataManager
    Handles the loading and storing of flight data from and to a text file.
    FlightStatus
    Enum representing the possible statuses of a flight.
    FlightTest
    Unit tests for the Flight class.
    Help
    Command to display the help message with all available commands.
    InputUtils
    Utility class providing methods to safely read and validate user inputs from a BufferedReader.
    InteractiveBookings
    Command implementation that facilitates interactive flight booking via console input.
    InteractiveBookingWindow
    InteractiveBookingWindow is a GUI window implemented using Swing that allows users to create new flight bookings interactively.
    ListBookings
    Command implementation that lists bookings in the flight booking system.
    ListBookingsWindow
    GUI window that displays a list of bookings in a table format.
    ListCustomers
    Command implementation that lists customers registered in the flight booking system.
    ListCustomersWindow
    GUI window that displays a list of customers in a table format.
    ListFlights
    Command implementation to list flights available in the flight booking system.
    ListFlightsWindow
    GUI window that displays a list of upcoming flights in a table format.
    LoadGUI
    Command implementation to launch the graphical user interface (GUI) of the flight booking system.
    LoginWindow
    Login window for the Flight Booking System.
    Main
    The entry point of the Flight Booking System application.
    MainWindow
     
    Rebook
     
    RebookWindow
    The RebookWindow class provides a graphical user interface (GUI) for rebooking flights in the Flight Booking System.
    RemoveBookingWindow
    GUI window that allows users to remove a booking by providing a customer ID and flight ID.
    RemoveCustomer
    Command to remove a customer and all their associated bookings from the system.
    RemoveCustomerWindow
    A GUI window that allows an administrator to remove a customer from the flight booking system.
    RemoveFlight
    Command to remove a flight and all its associated bookings from the system.
    RemoveFlightPanel
    A JPanel for removing a flight from the FlightBookingSystem by flight ID.
    SearchFlight
    Command to search flights based on multiple criteria such as origin, destination, departure date range, airline, and flight status.
    SearchFlightWindow
    A GUI window that allows users to search for flights in the flight booking system.
    ShowBookings
    The ShowBookings command is responsible for displaying all booking information associated with a specific customer.
    ShowBookingWindow
    The ShowBookingWindow class provides a GUI window that allows the user to search for and display all bookings associated with a given customer by entering the customer's ID.
    ShowCustomer
    The ShowCustomer command displays the main details and booking history of a customer identified by a given customer ID.
    ShowCustomerWindow
    The ShowCustomerWindow class creates a GUI window that allows the user to search for and view details of a specific customer by entering their Customer ID.
    ShowFlight
    Command to show full details of a flight by its ID.
    ShowFlightWindow
    The ShowFlightWindow class creates a GUI window that allows the user to view detailed information about a flight, including its passengers, by entering the Flight ID.
    UpdateCustomer
    The UpdateCustomer command allows updating an existing customer's personal details such as name, phone, passport info, etc., using their ID.
    UpdateCustomerWindow
    The UpdateCustomerWindow class provides a GUI form for editing and updating a customer's personal information in the Flight Booking System.
    UpdateFlight
    The UpdateFlight class implements the Command interface and allows for updating the details of an existing flight in the system.
    UpdateFlightWindow
    GUI window for updating flight details in the Flight Booking System.
    ViewCustomerWindow
    GUI window for viewing all customers registered in the Flight Booking System.
